metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
Charges: 34-9 and 34-9
D/0/A 6-21-69
Place of arrest: Wentworth  King Street

WILL BE TRIED FRIDAY MORNING.

1. Bernard Clay
2. Kenneth Gathers
3. Nathaniel Wilson
4. Annie L. Brown
5. William Smalls
6. Jessie Mae Jefferson
7. Louis Brown,Jr.
8. Fredrick Mills, Jr.
9. Curtis Nelson
10. Thelma Buncum
11. Pearline Ruby Canty
12. Donna Mae Whack
13. Geraldine Seal
14. Rosetta Ware
15. Virgie Lee Whack
16. James Carl Brown
17. Harry Eugene Simmons
18. Jerome Sidney Green
19. Andrew Daniels
